sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const AdminLogin = () => { const [dark, setDark] = useState(() => { if (typeof window !== "undefined") { return localStorage.getItem("darkMode") === "true"; } return false; }); // Update localStorage and class when dark changes useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem("darkMode", dark); if (dark) { document.documentElement.classList.add("dark"); } else { document.documentElement.classList.remove("dark"); } }, [dark]); return (
{/* Dark Mode Toggle */}

Forgot your password?
); }; export default AdminLogin;
